basics.summary: Reinforcement learning researcher pursuing a PhD at the [Bath Reinforcement Learning Laboratory (BRLL)](https://bathrllab.github.io/pages/people.html) under the supervision of professor [Özgür Şimşek](https://researchportal.bath.ac.uk/en/persons/özgür-şimşek)
